GeneDef.label: duplicator psylink
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have special innate psychic abilities and can receive psyfocus from the meditation of their duplicates.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Guarantees <color=#8a8ae6>psylink</color> or forms it over time.
Passively replenishes the <color=#8a8ae6>psyfocus</color> of relatively <color=#8a8ae6>meditating duplicates</color>.
